Use Nano Banana, Veo 3 and other AI tools to create images, concepts, simple storyboards and short clips. 		Refine AI-generated visuals in Photoshop & Illustrator for social media, web and basic branding needs. 		Prepare simple layouts and documents in InDesign (presentations, one-pagers, basic print materials). 		Edit short-form videos in Premiere and integrate AI-generated footage where needed. 		Follow brand guidelines and work closely with senior designers on daily tasks and campaigns.  Requirements

Fluent in English (spoken and written) is a must. 		Basic experience with AI image/video tools, ideally including Nano Banana and/or Veo 3 (or strong motivation to learn them fast). 		Intermediate knowledge of: 		Photoshop 		Illustrator 		InDesign 		Premiere 		Attention to detail, willingness to learn, and ability to take feedback.
A portfolio (even student/freelance work) showing your visual sense and any AI-assisted work.
Basic skills in Adobe After Effects (simple motion graphics, animated text, logo animations).
Experience creating content for social media (Reels, TikTok, YouTube Shorts).

AIESEC is a non-governmental not-for-profit organization in consultative status with the United Nations Economic and Social Council (ECOSOC), affiliated with the UN DPI, member of ICMYO, and is recognized by UNESCO. AIESEC International is registered as a non for profit organization, corporation number 1055154-6 in Montreal, Canada.
